id.description: A unique identifier for this challenge

name.description: A display name for this challenge

version.description: The version for this step-by-step challenge. this will be used by the editor to know how to load this data. Usually generated by the challenge generator

defaultApp.description: A stringified app exported from an editor. Usually exported by the challenge generator

whitelist.description: A set of APIs that will be available in the editor. Any other APIs will be hidden

.*.description: An API id availabel threough the editor

partsWhitelist.description: A list fo parts and their APIs that will be included in this challenge

.*.description: A part type. The part will then be made available in the editor during this challenge
